Package CreateBillboards

Class CreateBillboards

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
CreateBillboards.CreateBillboards
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class CreateBillboards
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Runnable
The CreateBillboards class allows for the creation, import and export of billboards in XML format. The XML format is compatible with the parser used for the billboard viewer application. Images can be imported as either URL links or as files from the computer. Handles import of XML files for editing, either as an XML file locally or through passing an XML string through the constructor. Exports billboards to the server with no local storage. Includes a previewer implemented from the BillboardViewer class.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • CreateBillboards

      public CreateBillboards()
      Constructs frame with no data loaded.

    • CreateBillboards

      public CreateBillboards​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String xmlData) throws java.io.IOException, org.xml.sax.SAXException
      Constructs frame with a preloaded billboard, for use with Edit Billboards functionality. An IOException is thrown by makeTempXML if there it is unable to create a temporary XML file. This can be due to system permissions. A SAXException is thrown by the XML parser if an invalid XML file is passed as input.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the billboard
      xmlData - the XML data for the billboard
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - when the file cannot be found
      org.xml.sax.SAXException - thrown by the XML parser if an invalid XML file is passed as input.

  • Method Details

    • makeTempXML

      public static void makeTempXML​(java.lang.String xmlData) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates a temp XML file for when needed. If the program does not have permissions to create the temporary file on the system, or if null values are passed, an IOException will be passed.
      Parameters:
      xmlData - the xml data in string format
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - is thrown if the file cannot be created

    • createGUI

      private void createGUI()
      The method to initialize and setup the billboard. Sets default size, close behavior and layout. The preview is insert into the frame, and buttons are initialized using a helper method. See also createButton(String) See also createPanel(Color) *

    • createButton

      private javax.swing.JButton createButton​(java.lang.String str)
      Helper method for creating buttons. Improves code readability and adds an action listener to each button.
      Parameters:
      str - the text to go on the button.
      Returns:
      a JButton object.

    • base64FromImageUrL

      public java.lang.String base64FromImageUrL​(java.net.URL url) throws java.io.IOException
      Method to turn an image URL to a base64 encoded string. Is useful for user created billboards so that images can be displayed even when there is no internet connection. Throws an IOException if the stream from the URL cannot be opened - for example if no internet connectivity exists or the target URL is down.
      Parameters:
      url - url object linking to the image
      Returns:
      base64 encoded String of the image
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - throws an IOException if the stream from the URL cannot be opened

    • isImage

      public boolean isImage​(java.net.URL url) throws java.io.IOException
      Checks to see if the passed URL leads to an image.
      Parameters:
      url - the URL the user wants to check if it leads to an image
      Returns:
      true or false
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - throws an IOException if a connection to the target URL cannot be made.

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Functionality for billboard creation implemented through action events. Includes the use of the XMLParser class for importing and exporting of billboards. *
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
      Parameters:
      e - - Reference to the button that the event came from.
      See Also:
      XMLParser

    • clearAllSettings

      private void clearAllSettings()
      Clears all values stored in billboard fields. Useful for restarting and creating a new billboard from scratch.

    • run

      public void run()
      Sets up the GUI with dimensions 500*500 and location (100,100). Packed and set visible. Called after the constructor.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
